plot: A frantic child reports to the tribal chief that her father killed her mother. The tribe chases and captures the man, dragging him back for tribal justice.
title: White Fawn's Devotion: A Play Acted by a Tribe of Red Indians in America
plot_es: A frantic child reports to the tribal chief that her father killed her mother. The tribe chases and captures the man, dragging him back for tribal justice.
original_name: White Fawn's Devotion: A Play Acted by a Tribe of Red Indians in America
plot_en: A frantic child reports to the tribal chief that her father killed her mother. The tribe chases and captures the man, dragging him back for tribal justice.
